03_central_limit_theorem/04_exam3/01_SNP_and_bounds_v1

The following questions use \(Z\) to refer to the standard normal variable. You will determine some probabilities and some boundaries.


  1. Determine \(z\) such that \(P(Z>z)=0.7967\)
  2. Determine \(P(-0.8<Z<0.8)\)
  3. Determine \(z\) such that \(P(Z<z)=0.9066\)
  4. Determine \(P(Z>-0.32)\)
  5. Determine \(P(Z<-0.62)\)
